headline.print_headline: Charges Dropped Against Principal Accused of Fire
headline.main: Charges Dropped Against Principal Accused of Fire

lead_paragraph: A judge on Monday dismissed charges against a former principal who was accused of setting fire to his private North Dakota high school in March, a week after a ruling that statements the defendant made to police were improperly obtained and couldn't be used at his trial.
